title: Yasuo and Infinity Edge
body:
Yasuo + The Infinity Edge change that is developing in the Pbe will create the craziest champion ever seen in League of Legends. Now you just need to buy an item which gives 25% or 30% crit chance and go directly into Infity Edge and GG. 100% crit chance + 20% True Damage.
I will try it by myself in Pbe because if this comes to the new patch It will be Hilarious.

Phantom Dancer + Infinity Edge = GL

Here another post that reflects my statement, but this one also adds Tryndamere to the Balanced List. https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/rAmdFJlk-why-is-no-one-mentioning-tryndamere-and-yasuo-with-the-new-ie-changes
